plot: Aang and friends arrive in the Earth Kingdom to begin his training, but a local general convinces Aang that all he needs to do is learn to control his Avatar state. Azula arrives to escort her brother and uncle back to the Fire Nation.

Aang and friends arrive in the Earth Kingdom to begin his earthbending training, but a local general convinces Aang that all he needs to do is learn to control his Avatar state. Azula, Zuko's sister, arrives to escort her brother and uncle back to the Fire Nation.—Taigan

Aang and his friends part ways with Pakku and the Northern Water Benders. Pakku and the water benders plan on going to the Southern Water Tribe that was previously destroyed by the Southern Raiders. Aang, Katara, and Sokka go to the Earth Kingdom to find an Earth Bending teacher, but Aang also needs to master the Avatar state. Meanwhile, Zuko and Iroh receive an unexpected visit from Azula, she tricks her brother and uncle on taking them home. Zuko and Iroh soon realize the ruse, both of them escape Azula. Zuko and Iroh cut off their ponytails as sign of their exile.—dawsonpersi
